meanings.definition: A device used to observe and study clouds.
meanings.sent1: The nephoscopes helped the scientists learn more about the clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use nephoscopes to examine different types of clouds.
meanings.sent3: The nephoscopes seemed to have a mind of their own, always pointing towards the clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like nephoscopes, scanning the sky for any sign of rain.
meanings.sent5: The nephoscopes revealed a world of fluffy white shapes floating above us.

meanings.definition: The act of using a nephoscope to analyze cloud formations.
meanings.sent1: The nephoscopes involved careful observation and analysis of cloud patterns.
meanings.sent2: Nephoscopes require skill and patience to interpret cloud movements accurately.
meanings.sent3: The nephoscopes dance was a hit at the cloud-watching party.
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a nephoscope, meticulously examining every detail of the clouds.
meanings.sent5: Through the nephoscopes, the clouds revealed their secrets to the eager students.
